491740.name: The Next World: Planetary Exploration
491740.description:
Explore the harsh wilderness of an unnamed world, uncover its secrets, conquer its unique terrain, and use its resources to bolster your colony through the vastly expanded strategy gameplay. Planetary Exploration offers a completely new way to experience the game with a host of new features, dozens of pieces of never-before-seen artwork, sound and music, and more control over your people's fate than ever. No TNW player can afford to miss it.

Features:

  • A completely new exploration system
  • Direct your salvage expeditions in detail
  • Find ore to mine - then mine it!
  • Manage your colony's power needs in detail with the new Power resource
  • Discover dozens of new events and conversations
